trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were no other sightings in San Francisco on or around January 1st 1981
Summary: Foggy Night In Daly City. On Bicycle With Friend. Stopped In School Yard, Fog Blowing Past Reveling UFO. Only Remember Being Frightened And Rode Away ASAP. Can't Remember Much More Detail. Don't Remember Conversations About This After The Fact?????
divs: sighting detailswas returning home on bicycle with friend. foggy night in daly city ca. stopped in schoolyard to chat with friend. as the fog was blowing past it had a large gap\opening that revealed the object very low, right above us at a 75' angle and in my line of sight. i told my friend and we both freaked out and took off asap. i remember riding as fast as i could up the ramp exit from schoolyard and after that details are less clear. i don't remember really sharing this info with my family after the fact. i'm writing this in the hopes that others may have witnessed this at that time. i'm convinced of two things. it was hiding in the fog and it was the same craft seen in phoenix in the mid 90's i would like to know if this craft has been seen before or after my account. thanks.
